title: ** User cancels login and opens a different page
preconditions: User has not previously logged in to the site
main_flow: The website prompts the user to sign in and displays a message "This site is asking you to sign in".
4. The browser opens a new page with the text "Not authorized".
If the user enters invalid credentials, the system will display an error message.
If the user forgets their password, they can click on the "Forgot password" link to reset their password.
postconditions: The user has not logged into the site
The user is on a page displaying the text "Not authorized"
